title: Add search/filter functionality
description: Press '/' to search repos by name. Filter display to show only matching repos with count indicator.

title: Add Home/End navigation keys
description: Add 'g'/'Home' to jump to first repo, 'G'/'End' to jump to last repo.

title: Add repository statistics to header
description: Show: total repos, dirty count, ahead count, behind count in header row.

title: Add sorting options
description: Press 's' to cycle through: Name, Status (dirty first), Ahead/Behind, Last Fetch. Show current sort in status.

title: Add stale repository indicators
description: Color-code last fetch by age: <1d green, 1-7d white, 7-30d yellow, >30d red with '\!' indicator.

title: Improve visual indicators with color coding
description: Color-code ahead/behind: green (ahead only), yellow (behind only), red (diverged). Add visual urgency indicators.

title: Add empty state handling
description: Show helpful message when no repos found. Include usage hint for scanning different directories.

title: Improve error display
description: Add error indicator icon in repo name. Use red row background. Press Enter to show full error in popup.

title: UX/UI improvements
description: Improve user experience and interface for git-dash TUI. Includes search/filter, sorting, better navigation, visual improvements, help screen, and better error handling.

title: Enhance status line with colors and timestamps
description: Add color-coded status (green/red/yellow). Show timestamps for operations. Display operation progress.

title: Add help screen
description: Press '?' to show/hide overlay with all keybindings and usage tips.
